metadata.title: CVE-2012-5825 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Tweepy does not verify that the server hostname matches a domain name inthe subject's Common Name (CN) or subjectAltName field of the X.509certificate, which allows man-in-the-middle attackers to spoof SSL serversvia an arbitrary valid certificate, related to use of the Python httpliblibrary.

criterions.comment: tweepy: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
